img_above_text:
![Wukong YellowFlower 60.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/22/Wukong_YellowFlower_60.jpg)
With that in mind, do you best to dodge his wing attacks after he extends them slightly, and unleash everything you've got in your arsenal to try burning down that 10%.
img_below_text:
If he takes to the air, play it safe and hang back, waiting to dodge when he divekicks his way back to you before trying to Immobilize and counter him.
![Wukong YellowFlower 62.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cd/Wukong_YellowFlower_62.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 58 from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong YellowFlower 60.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/22/Wukong_YellowFlower_60.jpg)
With that in mind, do you best to dodge his wing attacks after he extends them slightly, and unleash everything you've got in your arsenal to try burning down that 10%."
            - Following Text: "If he takes to the air, play it safe and hang back, waiting to dodge when he divekicks his way back to you before trying to Immobilize and counter him.
![Wukong YellowFlower 62.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cd/Wukong_YellowFlower_62.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts an intense moment in the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character is engaged in a battle with a winged enemy named "Supreme Inspector." The enemy is airborne, suggesting a need for the player to dodge aerial attacks and prepare for counterattacks. The preceding and following text advises players on tactics to avoid the enemy's wing attacks and divekicks, emphasizing the importance of strategic dodging and countering to defeat the enemy.
